Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.tui

Class ClientTUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.tui.ClientTUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class ClientTUI extends Object implements View
Client TUI represents the client that uses a Text-based user interface
